meanings.definition: A class of marine mollusks including octopuses, squids, and cuttlefish.
meanings.sent1: Cephalopods like octopuses and squids live in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cephalopods to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The cephalopods had a party in the deep sea, dancing with their tentacles.
meanings.sent4: In the mysterious depths, cephalopods roam like underwater aliens.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cephalopods swam gracefully, mesmerizing all who watched.

meanings.definition: Any member of this class of marine mollusks.
meanings.sent1: I saw a cephalopod at the aquarium, it was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: Cephalopods are known for their intelligence and unique abilities.
meanings.sent3: The cephalopod tried to hide in the sand but its tentacles gave it away.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cephalopod, reaching out in all directions for new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The cephalopod's camouflage was so effective, it seemed to disappear before my eyes.
